MasterCSS.controllers package¶

Submodules¶

MasterCSS.controllers.auth module¶

[summary]

raises ErrorValueException

If the Username is taken.

raises ErrorValueException

If the Phone is taken.

raises ErrorValueException

If the Email is taken.

return

[description]

rtype

[type]

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.get_mac_addresses()¶

Obtain a list of engineers’ device’s Bluetooth MAC address.

Returns

list of engineers’ device’s Bluetooth MAC address

Return type

dict

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.login()¶

Authenticate an user with the given username and password. It will use base64decode with SALT to authenticate the user

Returns

Dashboard if logged in successfully, otherwise redirect to login html with error message.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.logout(*args, **kwargs)¶

Handle log out request and clear the user session.

Returns

Redirect to homepage

Return type

redirect

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.register()¶

Handle register form submission, store password as hashed format. Check if the username, email and phone number are valid and not used.

Raises

  • ErrorValueException – if username exists or invalid

  • ErrorValueException – if email exists or invalid

  • ErrorValueException – if phone number exists or invalid

Returns

Dashboard if successfully registered. Otherwise, register page with errors.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.staff_auth()¶

Checks secret key that’s only known to staff.

Returns

Redirect to register if secret key is correct

Return type

redirect

MasterCSS.controllers.auth.verify_login(username, password)¶

Authenticate user’s login with username and password

Parameters

  • username (str) – user’s username

  • username – user’s password

Returns

user’s auth has been verified or not

Return type

boolean

MasterCSS.controllers.booking module¶

booking.py contains booking controllers.

MasterCSS.controllers.booking.book(*args, **kwargs)¶

Confirm/Book a car with the given car, pick up time, return time and cost. Add event into Google Calendar with the booking details.

Required user to have Oauth2 access. Else, it will prompt the user to authorize.

Returns

confirmation booking page with booking information

Return type

render_page

MasterCSS.controllers.booking.cancel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Cancel a booking and delete the event calendar. Required user to have access Oauth2Crednetials. Otherwise, it will prompt the user to authorize.

Returns

User booking history page.

Return type

redirect

MasterCSS.controllers.booking.confirm_booking(*args, **kwargs)¶

Confirming page with the datetime ranges with pickup time and cost.

Cost = car.CostPerHour + dateTimeDifferenceInHours

Returns

Confirmation page

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.booking.view(*args, **kwargs)¶

View a booking details.

Returns

Booking details with booking information, car information.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.booking.view_all_bookings(*args, **kwargs)¶

Gets all booking entries from the database and renders template. if logged in user is not admin redirect to 401.

Returns

render template with all the bookings

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.car module¶

booking.py contains car controllers.

MasterCSS.controllers.car.filter_car(*args, **kwargs)¶

End point to filter the car based on a given date and time range. Which use the get_available_cars(pickup_datetime, return_datetime, cars) returns.

Returns

Search result page with a list of available cars if there are any. Otherwise, render the dashboard page with an error message.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.car.get_all_cars()¶

End point to get all cars.

Returns

Returns details of all cars.

Return type

json

MasterCSS.controllers.car.get_available_cars(pickup_datetime, return_datetime, cars)¶

Return the available cars given a pickup_datetime and return_datetime. by make sure that there is no booking overlap between the two dates.

Parameters

  • pickup_datetime (datetime) – time to pick up the car

  • return_datetime (datetime) – time to return the car

  • cars (Car[]) – list of cars to filter

Returns

list of available cars

Return type

Car[]

MasterCSS.controllers.car.pickup_car(payload)¶

Pickup/unlock a car by making user’s current booking status ACTIVE.

Parameters

payload (dict) – pickup car payload from agent pi

Returns

car has been picked up or not

Return type

boolean

MasterCSS.controllers.car.return_car(payload)¶

Return/lock a car by making user’s current booking status INACTIVE.

Parameters

payload (dict) – return car payload from agent pi

Returns

car has been returned or not

Return type

boolean

MasterCSS.controllers.car.search_car(*args, **kwargs)¶

Filter cars based on given criterias.

Returns

Search result page with a list of cars that match the criterias

Return type

render_page

MasterCSS.controllers.car.search_car_admin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Renders searchResult.html for admin

Returns

search result template for admin it contains the search form

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.issue module¶

issue.py contains issue controllers.

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.create_new_issue(*args, **kwargs)¶

GET returns template of form to create issue, POST to add issue to the db

Parameters

id (int) – id of car

Returns

renders either a form or viewall issues template.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.handle_resolve_issue(eng_id, issue_id)¶

Handles payload from AP containing eng_id, issue_id that indicates the issue has been fixed by an engineer.

Parameters

  • eng_id (int) – user id that belongs to an engineer

  • issue_id (int) – issue id belongs to the issue being resolved

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.resolve_issue(*args, **kwargs)¶

Resolves a particular issue, changing the issue status

Parameters

id (int) – issue id

Returns

redirects to view taken controller if logged in user is an engineer, if logged in user is an admin redirects to view all issues controller.

Return type

redirect

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.send_notification(title, body)¶

sends a pb notification to all of the engineer devices that were registered in pushbullet account.

Parameters

  • title (string) – title of the notification

  • body (string) – body of the notification

Returns

if false then the token is not found within .env file

Return type

boolean

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.view_all_issues(*args, **kwargs)¶

Renders all the issues for admin users to see.

Returns

viewall template that renders all the issues.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.view_issue(*args, **kwargs)¶

View a partiuclar issue

Parameters

id (int) – issue id.

Returns

renders template to view issue details

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.view_pending(*args, **kwargs)¶

Renders all pending issues for engineers to see.

Returns

viewall template that renders all pending issues.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.issue.view_taken(*args, **kwargs)¶

View all the issues that an engineer has resolved

Returns

viewtaken template that renders issues that hold a user id that matches with a logged in engineer.

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.templates.index()¶

Index routing (“/”)

If the user has loged in, render the dashboard with cars content.

Otherwise, render the Home page.

Returns

a render html template

Return type

render_template

MasterCSS.controllers.templates.login()¶

Login routing (“/login”)

Returns

dashboard if logged in, else login.html

Return type

render_template
